title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3698/86 of 3 December 1986 on rules for imports into Germany of certain textile products (category 1) originating in Brazil
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3698/86
of 3 December 1986
on rules for imports into Germany of certain textile products (category 1) originating in Brazil
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A quantity of 750 tonnes is hereby deducted from the quantitative limit for 1986 on textile products of category 1, originating in Brazil, laid down for Germany in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 3589/82.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 December 1986.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
